text: @realDonaldTrump Wash your hands.  Cover your face in public.  Wear gloves.  Coronavirus is deadly.  It kills parents, children, elderly, policemen, nurses, doctors, ministers, priests, party-goers, picnickers - everyday.   Coronavirus is highly contagious.  Do not risk your church.  No cure yet!
